**Candidates may swiftly access their details by typing their surname or registration number into the search box located below.**

library(readxl)
cw11042022<- read_excel("cw11042025.xlsx")
library(DT)
datatable(cw11042022, class = 'cell-border stripe',rownames = FALSE,  options = list(pageLength = 100, scrollX=T,columnDefs=list(list(targets=2,visible=TRUE),list(className = 'dt-center', targets = 1:9))) )%>%
  formatStyle(
    'Test_1',
    color = styleInterval(c(0.495, 0.75), c('red', 'black', 'green')), fontWeight = 'bold') %>%
  formatPercentage('Test_1', 0)%>%
formatStyle(
